acronym: OPEN = Opportunities for People to Elevate and Network

legal_status.verification_note: Specific 501(c)(3) documentation not publicly available on website

mission.primary: Building environments that nurture Opportunities for People to Elevate and Network
mission.vision: A nonprofit and open source community of practice, dedicated to mutual support and growth
mission.approach: People pros (HR, TA, L&D, People Ops) learn and create with engineers, designers, researchers, and marketers. Everyone is a builder in their own way.
mission.access: Free-to-join space where members can learn, solve real problems, share what works, and build solutions others can use
mission.focus_area: The 'people industry' where the future of work and labor takes shape
mission.philosophy: Challenges must be met together through a nonprofit, open-source community model

programs_and_initiatives.name: Community of Practice
programs_and_initiatives.description: Collaborative space for HR professionals, talent acquisition specialists, learning & development experts, and people operations professionals
programs_and_initiatives.target_audience: HR, TA, L&D, People Ops professionals, engineers, designers, researchers, marketers

programs_and_initiatives.name: OPEN Community Hour
programs_and_initiatives.description: Weekly peer-support session described as a 'free-for-all' gathering for industry builders and problem-solvers

programs_and_initiatives.name: JD Auditor
programs_and_initiatives.purpose: Likely assists with job description analysis and improvement

programs_and_initiatives.name: AI Builder Series
programs_and_initiatives.description: Educational content on custom GPT development
programs_and_initiatives.focus: AI and technology skills for HR/people professionals

programs_and_initiatives.name: Volunteer Program
programs_and_initiatives.details: Specific roles and requirements not publicly detailed

leadership_and_governance.governance_structure: Information not available on public website

benefits: Access to tools like JD Auditor

donation_support.recommendation: Contact organization directly for donation information

key_differentiators: Open-source community approach to HR/people problems
Free access to all programs and resources
Tool building and solution sharing philosophy
Focus on 'the people industry' broadly, not just HR
research_limitations: Detailed volunteer role descriptions not available
Leadership team not identified on website
Some pages (about, community, contact) returned 404 errors
Tax documentation (Form 990) not linked from website
recommended_next_steps: Contact organization directly via social media for detailed leadership information
Request Form 990 for financial transparency and governance details
Check IRS Tax Exempt Organization Search for official 501(c)(3) verification
Reach out through LinkedIn company page for founder story and history
Subscribe to newsletter for ongoing updates and impact stories
Visit volunteer opportunities page for current engagement options
